```
def printOwing(self):
    self.printBanner()

    # print details
    print("name:", self.name)
    print("amount:", self.getOutstanding())
```

```
def printOwing(self):
    self.printBanner()
    self.printDetails(self.getOutstanding())

def printDetails(self, outstanding):
    print("name:", self.name)
    print("amount:", outstanding)
```
